author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Euronext Successfully Launches 500 Million Dollar Bond Issue, Listed On Euronext Dublin
text:
April 11 (Reuters) - EURONEXT NV:
* EURONEXT SUCCESSFULLY LAUNCHES AN INAUGURAL €500 MILLION BOND ISSUE, LISTED ON EURONEXT DUBLIN
* 7-YEAR INAUGURAL BOND ISSUE
* AN ANNUAL COUPON OF 1% AND LISTED ON EURONEXT DUBLIN * EURONEXT SUCCESSFULLY LAUNCHES AN INAUGURAL €500 MILLION BOND ISSUE, LISTED ON EURONEXT DUBLIN
* ORDER BOOK REACHED AN AMOUNT OF MORE THAN EUR 2.2 BILLION AND WAS MORE THAN 4.4 TIMES OVERSUBSCRIBED
* PROCEEDS OF ISSUE WILL BE USED TO REFINANCE IN WHOLE EXISTING EUR 165M TERM LOAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
